alert.note: Alert for Linn; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 6:52AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Miami, Linn and southern Bates Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 651 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Blue Mound, or 9 miles south of Mound City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Osawatomie, Butler, Rich Hill, Pleasanton, La Cygne, Mound City, Linn Valley, Hume, Parker, Blue Mound, Prescott, Fontana, Amsterdam, Amoret, Foster, Worland and Beagle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
